content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Customize the retention period for risk event data in Cyber Risk Exposure Management September 8, 2025—Retain risk event data for longer than 30 days by configuring the risk event data retention settings in the Data sources and retention section of Data Source and Log Management. You can set a custom retention period of up to two years. Risk event data older than 30 days does not display in Threat and Exposure Management, but the data is viewable using platform search.
